title: When Justin Bieber is coming to India? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can find all the details about JB Concert in india over here - Things to watch out in the “Purpose Performance” He is coming on 10th May at DY Patil Stadium in Mumbai

GREAT NEWS GUYS! Justin Bieber will be in India for an entire week this year. He will visit Mumbai, Delhi and Agra and will perform at the DY Patil stadium on May 10th. Tickets are on sale and will start from 4k rupees. Hope you make it :)
